title: Language Competency Development Course through Wiki-Based Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and language learning experience
context.additional_context: Learners engage in collaborative activities anytime/anywhere via mobile devices, while teachers provide real-time feedback and scaffolding through digital platforms

learning_goals: Using wiki platforms, learners derive deep understanding of topics through collaborative writing processes
Learners can apply effective communication strategies with peers during the process of selecting inquiry-based topics and sharing resources.
Learners can perform a content improvement process based on critical thinking and feedback acceptance skills in a wiki-based collaborative learning environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
